name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save & Organize your favorite content in Odin

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A social centralized place for your bookmarks. Twitter threads, TikToks, Reddit posts, links, recipes, videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Odin Chrome Extension allows users to easily save and organize content they come across. The items they save can be added to one of the collections theyâ€™ve previously created via the Odin app or to a new one, making it easier to find them later on in the mobile app.

You can download the mobile Odin app from here: https://odinapp.app.link/chrome
